intent_atoms.description: Draft C3 detail/hex stores that subscribe to the Combine bridge for payload slices and metadata panels.
Integrate the outline explorer with real file ingestion so streaming parse sessions drive live snapshots.
Extend outline filters to cover box categories and streaming metadata (tracked via @todo #6).

functional_units.description: Subscribe to the Combine bridge for payload slices and metadata panels
